segments.content: Written by
Thomas Lennon & Robert Ben Garant
Jason Fulardi, Scott Alexander & Larry Karaszewki March 3rd, 2004

dialogue.text: Jason Fulardi, Scott Alexander & Larry Karaszewki March 3rd, 2004

segments.content:
A fishing boat pushes over choppy water. FOUR GUN TOTING

          MEN on Jet Skis wearing black wet suits and goggles

          escort the boat. Flying above it is a HELICOPTER.

A SERBIAN MAN captains the wheel. SERB 2 scans the

          horizon with binoculars. He checks the GPS system, then

          his watch, then speaks into his throat mic. All italics

          are Serbian w/ subtitles:
Fifteen minutes to delivery.
The JET SKIER in the lead weighs in on a radio.
The HELICOPTER PILOT weighs in.

EXT. SKY - CONTINUOUS The camera descends as the boat passes, and dives beneath the surface. EXT. PACIFIC OCEAN - CONTINUOUS The droning of engines becomes less pronounced. Foam from the boat and skis bubbles. Calm. Then from out of nowhere five NAVY SEALs wearing RE- BREATHERS appear, in neat formation like the Blue Angels. JET PROPELLED BACKPACKS push the SEALs through the water. The LEAD SEAL: SHANE WOLFE, points upwards. All eyes follow his finger to the underbelly of the boat above. From his belt, Shane takes a steel wand with an adhesive disc attached, aims it at the fleeing boat and FIRES. A cable shoots up -- THUD... The disc sticks to the boat's hull. Shane pushes a button on the wand retracting the cable and drawing himself closer. Dangling from the cruiser, Shane fixes a BOMB to the hull. He releases himself from the boat and speeds away --

dialogue.text: EXT. SKY - CONTINUOUS The camera descends as the boat passes, and dives beneath the surface. EXT. PACIFIC OCEAN - CONTINUOUS The droning of engines becomes less pronounced. Foam from the boat and skis bubbles. Calm. Then from out of nowhere five NAVY SEALs wearing RE- BREATHERS appear, in neat formation like the Blue Angels. JET PROPELLED BACKPACKS push the SEALs through the water. The LEAD SEAL: SHANE WOLFE, points upwards. All eyes follow his finger to the underbelly of the boat above. From his belt, Shane takes a steel wand with an adhesive disc attached, aims it at the fleeing boat and FIRES. A cable shoots up -- THUD... The disc sticks to the boat's hull. Shane pushes a button on the wand retracting the cable and drawing himself closer. Dangling from the cruiser, Shane fixes a BOMB to the hull. He releases himself from the boat and speeds away --

segments.content: BOOM. A dense explosion sends ripples through the water
and ELECTRICITY crackling around the boat.

A SURGE of ELECTRICAL FORCE blasts from the control

          panel. SPARKS fly.

          The two Serbian Men jolt backwards -- WHAM -- and hit the

          wall. All the needles inside all the dials go LIMP. The

          roar of the engines DIES and the boat STOPS.

heading.raw_text: EXT. PACIFIC OCEAN, UNDER THE BOAT - CONTINUOUS

segments.content: Shane slips inside the hull, through the new hole.
The chopper slows to a hover.   The Pilot looks below.

EXT. PACIFIC OCEAN - CONTINUOUS The jet skiers protectively circle the injured boat in a SYNCHRONIZED SWIMMING move, and the Jet Ski drivers are simultaneously YANKED below the surface: a split second later they're replaced by our SEALS (ALSO IN BLACK WET SUITS AND GOGGLES) -- the switch happens in less than a second, way too fast for anyone to notice. INT. FISHING BOAT/CONTROL DECK - CONTINUOUS The shaken Serbs climb to their feet.

dialogue.text: EXT. PACIFIC OCEAN - CONTINUOUS The jet skiers protectively circle the injured boat in a SYNCHRONIZED SWIMMING move, and the Jet Ski drivers are simultaneously YANKED below the surface: a split second later they're replaced by our SEALS (ALSO IN BLACK WET SUITS AND GOGGLES) -- the switch happens in less than a second, way too fast for anyone to notice. INT. FISHING BOAT/CONTROL DECK - CONTINUOUS The shaken Serbs climb to their feet.

segments.content: They look around, and see the SEALS, on the jet skis: In the masks they are indistinguishable from the GUN-TOTTING MEN they switched paces with. All seems clear. Serb 1 pushes on the throttle... nothing.

dialogue.text: They look around, and see the SEALS, on the jet skis: In the masks they are indistinguishable from the GUN-TOTTING MEN they switched paces with. All seems clear. Serb 1 pushes on the throttle... nothing.

segments.content: Suddenly the boat lists -- and water pours in, under the cabin door. They spring into action!

character.name: We've been hit. We're taking on water.

dialogue.text: Suddenly the boat lists -- and water pours in, under the cabin door. They spring into action!

segments.content: Grab the professor, quick!

Serb 1 rushes out, shouting orders: He alerts four ARMED

          GUARDS and the Jet Ski drivers (now our Seals).

The Armed Guards fire relentlessly into the water. Serb 2 rushes below deck. INT. SHIP'S HOLD - CONTINUOUS PROFESSOR CHARLES PLUMMER, bound to a chair and gagged, tries to YELP as the room begins to flood with water. INT. SHIP'S CORRIDOR - SIMULTANEOUS Serb 2 runs down steps to the lowermost hold. He tries to force the door open. When it finally opens, he is forced back by a three foot wall of water. INT. SHIP'S HOLD - CONTINUOUS Professor Plummer panics, as the water rises up to his mouth He struggles, but can't get free. Up to his nose, over his head.... He's gone. Then Shane Wolf rises out of the water, hauling the Professor up. He cuts the Professor's GAG. Plummer screams. Shane removes his mouth piece. Shane doesn't seem the slightest bit fazed by the circumstances.

character.name: Something must be below us! Shoot! Shoot!

dialogue.text: The Armed Guards fire relentlessly into the water. Serb 2 rushes below deck. INT. SHIP'S HOLD - CONTINUOUS PROFESSOR CHARLES PLUMMER, bound to a chair and gagged, tries to YELP as the room begins to flood with water. INT. SHIP'S CORRIDOR - SIMULTANEOUS Serb 2 runs down steps to the lowermost hold. He tries to force the door open. When it finally opens, he is forced back by a three foot wall of water. INT. SHIP'S HOLD - CONTINUOUS Professor Plummer panics, as the water rises up to his mouth He struggles, but can't get free. Up to his nose, over his head.... He's gone. Then Shane Wolf rises out of the water, hauling the Professor up. He cuts the Professor's GAG. Plummer screams. Shane removes his mouth piece. Shane doesn't seem the slightest bit fazed by the circumstances.

segments.content: Lieutenant Shane Wolfe, United States
Navy. I'm gonna get you outta here. But
you have to do exactly what I say, when I
say it. My way -- no highway option. Do
you copy?
(Plummer nods, terrified.)
The Professor gestures across the room, where a metal BRIEFCASE is floating. Shane calmly HANDCUFFS it to his own waist. As the water rises, to the roof.

dialogue.text: The Professor gestures across the room, where a metal BRIEFCASE is floating. Shane calmly HANDCUFFS it to his own waist. As the water rises, to the roof.

segments.content: Shane sticks the mouth piece into Plummer's mouth, giving him his oxygen. EXT. ON THE DECK - SIMULTANEOUS

character.name: How did you know where I...

dialogue.text: Shane sticks the mouth piece into Plummer's mouth, giving him his oxygen. EXT. ON THE DECK - SIMULTANEOUS

segments.content: The Armed Guards stop shooting into the water. One of
our SEALS calls out to them, in PERFECT SERBIAN:
The Guards fire again. The SEAL speaks into his neck mic.
Give it a second, they're almost out of
ammo.
The Seal calls out: "shoot more, more!" They do, until
there's nothing but empty CLICKS from their guns.
Now Lieutenant. Chopper's four meters at
your 10 o'clock.
Just before the water envelopes him and Plummer...
(into his mic)
I've got the Prof and the case. First
round's on me back at Virginia Beach.
Shane takes a deep breath, and pulls himself, the
Professor and the briefcase UNDER the water.

Shane and the Professor rise to the surface as the boat

          falters behind them. Shane pulls out a retractable

          CROSSBOW. It clicks open and he shoots a CABLE into the

          belly of the helicopter above him.
INT. HELICOPTER - A SECOND LATER Shane appears at the Pilot's door, holding the Professor. Shane addresses the Pilot in perfect SERBIAN.

dialogue.text: INT. HELICOPTER - A SECOND LATER Shane appears at the Pilot's door, holding the Professor. Shane addresses the Pilot in perfect SERBIAN.

segments.content: The Pilot nods, terrified. Shane TOSSES the Pilot out. Shane swings into the hot seat and grabs the controls, pulling the Professor in behind him.

dialogue.text: The Pilot nods, terrified. Shane TOSSES the Pilot out. Shane swings into the hot seat and grabs the controls, pulling the Professor in behind him.

heading.subject: ON THE SURFACE OF THE WATER
heading.raw_text: ON THE SURFACE OF THE WATER - CONTINUOUS

segments.content:
The SEALS on the Jet Skis SALUTE Shane in the chopper,

          then disappear gracefully back into the water.

Shane smiles, clearly he loves this kind of day. He looks

          beside him, the Professor looks terrified. The Professor

          takes out his mouth piece.
Oh my God. I can't believe you... how'd
we... That was the most incredible...
Shane sticks the mouth piece back in the Professors'
mouth, shutting him up.
Better keep that on `til we get to the
(through the mouth piece)
Why? Poison gas?
(re: the oxygen)

EXT. MOUNTAIN CLEARING - A LITTLE LATER A Pave Hawk SH-60 helicopter, rotors whirling slowly, waits. Shane's chopper appears from behind a tree line and sets down atop the mountain by a stream. Shane and Charles sprint from the chopper towards the waiting Hawk. Charles stops Shane.

character.name: No. I'm just not big on chit chat.

dialogue.text: EXT. MOUNTAIN CLEARING - A LITTLE LATER A Pave Hawk SH-60 helicopter, rotors whirling slowly, waits. Shane's chopper appears from behind a tree line and sets down atop the mountain by a stream. Shane and Charles sprint from the chopper towards the waiting Hawk. Charles stops Shane.

segments.content: Lieutenant, thank you. (He pats his
briefcase) You saved more than just my
life today. Can I call my wife to let
her know I'm okay?
Negative. Not imperative to the mission.
We have to keep moving. I have strict
orders to get you out of here safely.
I'm safe, Lieutenant. Please. She thinks
I'm dead. (then) Don't you have a family?
(this gets him:)
Charles picks up his briefcase. He holds the lock up to his mouth and whispers into it:

dialogue.text: Charles picks up his briefcase. He holds the lock up to his mouth and whispers into it:

segments.content: The briefcase pops open. Shane looks at him, puzzled.

dialogue.text: The briefcase pops open. Shane looks at him, puzzled.

segments.content: My kids. It's voice activated. Designed
it myself. I do security, that's my
specialty. (gestures back:) Those guys
back there tried to get this case open
for five days -- couldn't crack it. And
you should see what happens to you if
open it without the code. I have a
picture of my kids in here, you want to
see it?
Charles takes a cell-phone out of the case. Shane looks in the case: it's EMPTY, except for the phone and a family PHOTO. Charles dials his cell phone... nothing

dialogue.text: Charles takes a cell-phone out of the case. Shane looks in the case: it's EMPTY, except for the phone and a family PHOTO. Charles dials his cell phone... nothing

segments.content: Shane considers, then hands him his satellite phone. Charles dials, and talks...

dialogue.text: Shane considers, then hands him his satellite phone. Charles dials, and talks...

segments.content: INT. PAVE HAWK - CONTINUOUS Shane climbs in the Hawk and approaches the cockpit.    The PILOT sits, back to him.

dialogue.text: INT. PAVE HAWK - CONTINUOUS Shane climbs in the Hawk and approaches the cockpit.    The PILOT sits, back to him.

segments.content: The Pilot slumps forward... DEAD. Shane turns-

character.name: We're almost ready.    Just gives us a -

dialogue.text: The Pilot slumps forward... DEAD. Shane turns-

segments.content: WHAM.   Shane drops, knocked unconscious.   All goes black.

dialogue.text: WHAM.   Shane drops, knocked unconscious.   All goes black.

segments.content:
The helicopter is on fire. Wolf lies facedown in the

          stream. He looks around, barely conscious.

          SHANE'S P.O.V.: Everything is a blur, in slow-motion. He

          sees Charles, unconscious. A Huey Helicopter lands. A

          VERY TALL MAN steps out, and takes Charles' Briefcase.

          There is huge explosion, as the chopper ignites.

          Everything is ablaze. Shane reaches out, grabs the

          picture of Charles' kids then goes unconscious.
TITLE CARD: 1 Month Later

Shane lies in a hospital bed, despondent. His arm and

          face bandaged.

          Shane's Captain enters: BILL FAWCETT (35) -- friendly,

          unassuming. He looks like he hasn't slept in days. Shane

          salutes him with his bandaged arm -- it hurts to salute,

          but he does it anyway.
Captain, sir.
Bill sits down beside the bed. He takes a long look at Shane. He holds a REPORT in his hand.

dialogue.text: Bill sits down beside the bed. He takes a long look at Shane. He holds a REPORT in his hand.

segments.content: We've been through a lot together Shane.
You're the best man I ever trained. And a
good friend.
... I know sir. And I except full
responsibility for the mission's failure.
Why the hell did you let him use the
satellite phone?
He had to call his family. A lapse in
judgement on my part that I regret sir.
Bill shakes his head, disappointed. He pulls up a chair,
and sits opposite Shane.
... Plummer was the best security expert
the department of defense ever had -- a
genius. He was working on a program that
scrambles launch codes. He called it
G.H.O.S.T.: Guided High-altitude
Scrambling Transmitter. One pulse from
the GHOST satellite and a country can't
launch its own nukes. That's what the
Serbians kidnapped him for, but they
couldn't get S
inside the briefcase.
The case was empty sir, as I stated in my
report.
Bill considers this. Then...
Not a surprise, really. Not like the
professor to hide things where someone
might look for them. G.H.O.S.T. is still
out there, (Bill smiles:) which is why

heading.subject: I'm going to give you another shot.
heading.raw_text: I'm going to give you another shot.

segments.content: Shane sits up. He can't believe his good fortune.
Sir. Thank you. I... appreciate your
confidence.
Invigorated, he pulls off bandages, disconnects an IV,
and starts to rise.
I'll need to put a team together. I'm
gonna need the mini sub, I need access to
an EP3 aries 2 spy plane...
(interrupting:)
Shane listens, intrigued.

character.name: Negative. It's not that kind of mission.

dialogue.text: Shane listens, intrigued.

segments.content: Two days ago, I got a call from the
professor's wife... Widow. She told me
someone had broken into her home.
Searched the place, top to bottom.
She's scared. The family's scared.
Whoever killed the professor must think
G.H.O.S.T. is in that house. Maybe it is,
maybe it isn't. Either way, I need
someone to stay at that house, and
protect them. And while you're there --
find out if the program is in there.
That's it? Why would you want me for
that, sir.
Shane is surprised... Bill pulls a tiny tape recorder from his pocket, presses play, we hear PROFESSOR PLUMMER'S voice.

dialogue.text: Shane is surprised... Bill pulls a tiny tape recorder from his pocket, presses play, we hear PROFESSOR PLUMMER'S voice.

segments.content: Honey, I'm alive. Listen: A lot can
happen between here and home -- if
anything happens to me, call Lt. Shane
Wolfe. He's a good man... anyway, I
should go. I'll call you in an hour. I
love you.
Shane is shocked, hearing the dead man's voice.
... You gotta problem with this mission?
Sirnosir. It's just that... I've never
been very good with kids, sir. Not even
when I was a kid sir.

Shane packs his duffel bag. He opens a drawer: There's

          five t-shirts, identical to the one he wears. He opens

          another drawer: Five khaki pants, also identical to the

          one he wears. He opens the closet: There's a massive fur-

          collared coat. Hm. He rejects it.

          Shane packs his duffel with military gear: GPS compass,

          night vision goggles, camouflage vest, machete... they

          all go in. Shane heads to the door, then goes back to his

          chest of drawers. He reaches in, and pulls out a small,

          old MEDAL: the ribbon is faded and frayed. He looks at it

          for a moment, then unzips his suit and pins it to the

          inside, like it's a lucky rabbit's foot.

A taxi door opens. Shane looks like a bad ass, ready for

          anything. He steps from the taxi onto an adorable TROLL

          doll on the sidewalk. It SQUEAKS.

          Shane's P.O.V.: Julie's unkempt suburban house, with toys

          all over the lawn, and a "BLESS THIS MESS" welcome mat.

          Shane double-checks the address. The sprinklers go off.

          Shane darts to the door and rings the bell (it's one of

          those long cheerful doorbells).

          WE hear TINY FEET approach -- then the door swings open,

          Shane looks down -- and sees LULU, 8, peering up at him.

          Shane eyes Lulu. Lulu eyes Shane, then:
Mom! There's some weird bald guy at the
door!
SLAM. Lulu shuts the door in Shane's face. Shane frowns.
WE hear heavier footsteps approaching.
EMALE VOICE (o.s.)
(before she sees Shane:)
Look, if you're with the Hare Krishnas,
we're not interested...
The door opens revealing JULIE PLUMMER. Julie holds
NAKED baby PETER, 2. She sees Shane, and stops, a little
startled by his size...
(salutes:)
Lieutenant Shane Wolfe, reporting for
duty.
Of course. I'm so sorry.   Thank you for
coming.
She hugs him. He's not quite sure what to do -- he's a
rock, he doesn't flinch.
INT. PLUMMER HOUSE/FOYER - DAY It's warm and quiet.   Petite Julie SCREAMS up the stairs-

character.name: Come in and meet the rest of the gang.

dialogue.text: INT. PLUMMER HOUSE/FOYER - DAY It's warm and quiet.   Petite Julie SCREAMS up the stairs-

segments.content: Shane startles, covers his ears.

And then three pairs of feet come down the stairs. Lulu, ZOE, 15, and TODD, 14 line up like the perfect family portrait. Todd's hair hangs in his face. He wears a Sid Vicious shirt and a long trench coat.

character.name: Get your butts down here and say "hello!"

dialogue.text: And then three pairs of feet come down the stairs. Lulu, ZOE, 15, and TODD, 14 line up like the perfect family portrait. Todd's hair hangs in his face. He wears a Sid Vicious shirt and a long trench coat.

segments.content: You've already met Lulu. This is Peter,
Zoe and Todd. Kids, this is Lieutenant
Wolfe. He's the man who is going to be
staying with us for a while.
All the kids except for Todd-
Shane nods, stern. On the stairs, a Romanian MAID walks by, carrying a BABY.

dialogue.text: Shane nods, stern. On the stairs, a Romanian MAID walks by, carrying a BABY.

segments.content: Shane nods hello to them.

character.name: And this is Helga and Tyler.

dialogue.text: Shane nods hello to them.

segments.content: (official:)
Ma'am... Baby.
Kids, go finish your homework.   And I'll
be checking.
Zoe, Lulu and Todd climb back up the stairs. Julie leads
Shane into...

Julie sits, Shane stands "at ease" (which doesn't look

          "at ease" at all).
You have a pleasant family, ma'am.
Charles wasn't around too much. His work
took him all over the world. He'd be gone
six or seven months at a time. So I
think for the younger ones it's a little
confusing. Zoe and Todd... well, they're
dealing like your normal teenagers.
Maybe in Todd's case semi-normal.
Mrs. Plummer, I have to tell you that I
did everything I could...
Charles was in a dangerous business. I
knew it when I married him. No one's to
blame here.
(beat)
Everyone thinks that Charles told me or
the kids where he hid it. And until
G.H.O.S.T. is found, we're all in danger.
Nothing will happen to your family as
long as I'm here. I've dealt with much...
Suddenly from behind Shane's head a DUCK appears and
NIBBLES his ear. Shane spins in full fight stance. He
sees the Duck... and relaxes. Sort of.
The duck QUACKS angrily. Confused, Shane returns to "at ease," keeping one eye on the duck.

dialogue.text: The duck QUACKS angrily. Confused, Shane returns to "at ease," keeping one eye on the duck.

segments.content: Mrs. Plummer-
Beat.

dialogue.text: Beat.

segments.content: ... Mrs. Plummer, I'll go secure the
perimeter.
I'm glad you're here-
But Shane is already gone.

Shane secures the area.       He paces off the yard.

          He mounts surveillance cameras in the eaves.

          He attaches contact alarms in the doors and windows.

          Shane climbs a telephone pole, opens the circuit box and

          TAPS the phones.

          Shane, now wearing an EAR TRANSMITTER, crawls through the

          shrubs, hiding electric eyes.

           Nighttime -- the family eats dinner. We slowly pull

          out... through the kitchen window... and reveal Shane

          with night vision goggles on scoping the property.

          The phone RINGS inside. Through the window, Julie

          casually answers it. Shane touches his ear transmitter

          and LISTENS as he walks into the house.
BILL (o.s.)
Julie, it's Bill Fawcett. I have some
potentially good news.
What is it?
BILL (o.s.)
A safety deposit box under Charles' name
was just found in Switzerland. I think
it could contain GHOST.
That's wonderful. This could all be over!
BILL (o.s.)
There's a catch. Swiss law says only his
family can access it. I'm going to need
you on a plane tomorrow morning.
Shane, listening to the conversation, enters-
I'll be there.
Julie and Shane share a look.

Julie, with her suitcase, Shane, Helga and the Kids stand

          in the doorway. Zoe listens to her I-Pod ignoring the hug

          Julie gives her.
Don't worry about the Kids, Helga will
handle everything. (Worried:) But if
there is an emergency, all the emergency
numbers are on the fridge. And on the
phone. And on the back door...
Mom -- we'll be fine, chill.
(a little choked up:)
I know, it's just... I am a mom, it's my
job to worry. ... I love you guys. I'm
gonna miss you. I'll be back in 48 hours.
And guys, whatever Lieutenant Wolfe asks
you to do... do it. Okay?

ll the children nod in agreement except Zoe who pops her

          chewing gum bubble.
Lieutenant, I don't want you to worry
about anything except the safety of my
children. Helga will take care of
everything else.
Don't worry. They'll be safe with me.
Julie gets in the car and it drives away. Shane turns back to the kids who loom in the doorway.

character.name: Everything will be fine, Mrs. Plummer.

dialogue.text: Julie gets in the car and it drives away. Shane turns back to the kids who loom in the doorway.

segments.content: Tell me, are you licensed to kill?
(she frowns)
H S

dialogue.text: H S

segments.content: Helga trudges up the path and in.

Shane, on a short ladder, screws in a surveillance camera

          into the corner of a wall when he hears:
MALE VOICE (o.s.)

Lulu SCREAMS. The sound of MACHINE GUN FIRING. Immediately, Shane leaps off the ladder and bounds down the stairs two at a time and into the... INT. HOUSE/FAMILY ROOM - NIGHT hane rushes in -- and finds Lulu screaming and giggling in front of a VIDEO GAME. Shane shakes his head.

dialogue.text: Lulu SCREAMS. The sound of MACHINE GUN FIRING. Immediately, Shane leaps off the ladder and bounds down the stairs two at a time and into the... INT. HOUSE/FAMILY ROOM - NIGHT hane rushes in -- and finds Lulu screaming and giggling in front of a VIDEO GAME. Shane shakes his head.

segments.content: And Shane spies half of Todd's face peeking around a corner staring at him...

dialogue.text: And Shane spies half of Todd's face peeking around a corner staring at him...

segments.content: Todd disappears. WAAAAA!! WAAAAA!! Shane spins, looks around for the CRYING BABY... can't find him.

dialogue.text: Todd disappears. WAAAAA!! WAAAAA!! Shane spins, looks around for the CRYING BABY... can't find him.

segments.content: ... Where's the baby?
Without looking Lulu points. A diapered Peter stands in
the half full AQUARIUM, pouring in Cheerios. Helga
enters holding the wailing Tyler. Gary suddenly FLIES by -
- WHRRP! Shane ducks. Shane scowls at Helga:
You run a very loose ship.
You don't like it? You're the SEAL. You
do something. I make bottle.
elga stomps out. Shane heads down the hall, when in the
corner of his eye -- he sees A FIGURE SCURRY ACROSS THE
BACK LAWN. Shane turns off the light. He shuts off the
window alarm and sneaks out silently.

heading.raw_text: EXT. PLUMMER HOUSE - BACK YARD - CONTINUOUS

segments.content:
The yard is littered with toys. In the middle is a

          TRAMPOLINE. He spots the Figure climbing the TRELLIS.

          Shane runs, jumps onto the trampoline. He flies in the

          air and latches onto the figure. They both tumble to the

          ground.

          Shane yanks off the DARK FIGURE's hood, revealing SCOTT

          (16) a nervous teenager. He's dazed, but alright, wearing

          SHARPER IMAGE night vision goggles.
... Zoe?
Zoe runs out the door, setting off the PIERCING ALARM.
He's my boyfriend, tool.
So you're the one who broke in.
Zoe -- go back inside.
Shane grabs Scott by the scruff of the neck.

dialogue.text: Shane grabs Scott by the scruff of the neck.

segments.content: Not with this kid. (to Todd:) You --
Freaked, Scott fumbles for his wallet and gives Shane a twenty dollar BILL.

dialogue.text: Freaked, Scott fumbles for his wallet and gives Shane a twenty dollar BILL.

segments.content: Befuddled, Scott starts to   do lame push-ups. Shane grabs the back of Scott's shirt,   LIFTING him in the air, spinning him away from the   house like a marionette. Scott runs off, calling out from   across the street.

dialogue.text: Befuddled, Scott starts to   do lame push-ups. Shane grabs the back of Scott's shirt,   LIFTING him in the air, spinning him away from the   house like a marionette. Scott runs off, calling out from   across the street.

segments.content: ... I'll call you, Zoe!
Zoe storms inside. Shane stands there, fuming. The
Alarm's still blaring. The window of the house next door
opens: a Korean couple, THE CHUNS, pop their heads out.
They're arguing with each other in Korean. Shane
addresses them, IN PERFECT KOREAN with subtitles:
My apologies. We had an intruder. A
simple misunderstanding.
(perfect English, no accent)
We speak English, Kojak.
Oh. Sorry.
... Look, about the 2000 decibel alarm
and the kleig lights and stuff... we own
a bakery, so we're up kind of early.
Would you mind?
Shane pulls a remote control from his pocket and clicks it. The alarm stops.

dialogue.text: Shane pulls a remote control from his pocket and clicks it. The alarm stops.

segments.content: Thanks a bunch. Oh, and we found this in
our pool filter... Try to keep that zoo
reigned in, huh baby-sitter?
Mr. Chun tosses him the TROLL DOLL and slam their window
shut. Shane's about to head inside, he pulls a tiny

heading.subject: camera phone from his pocket, and snaps a shot of the
heading.raw_text: camera phone from his pocket, and snaps a shot of the

segments.content: Chun's car in their driveway.

hane marches Zoe up the stairs. Loud, angry rock music

          blares from Todd's room.
Your mother thought you were in real
danger. You should have told her the
truth.

Zoe starts to turn -- then suddenly spins and tries kicking him in the CROTCH. But Shane catches her foot -- and whirls her away. She has to hop on one foot, to not fall over. He "hops" her down the hall to her room. S

character.name: Who do you think you are -- my dad?

stick around and keep eyes on the kids?
She smiles.
Permission granted. Welcome aboard. Just
try not to frighten the children.
No one will even notice I'm here.

Shane, dead serious, (Tyler in Snuggle) is riding the see-

Shane closes the computer, picks up a pair of binoculars. BINOCULARS P.O.V. as Shane goes from window to window of the school: Zoe is glaring at him through the window from her seat in a class. Todd, sitting in the back row of a class, yanks his hood over his head. Lulu waves from 2nd Grade, delighted. Along line of FIRST GRADERS wait for the seesaw.

segments.content: Back off. Official Business.

Shane stands with his Baby snuggle. Peter is running in

BINOCULARS P.O.V.: Five hundred students eat at long

Give up now. Save us both a world of
pain. Now -- last time: Open the hanger,
Reveal: Shane is talking to Tyler, in his safety seat -- trying to get him to eat. Beside Shane, Peter is destroying a sandwich with animal crackers.

segments.content: What would you say is the secret with
kids, Mr. Wolfe?
Show no weakness.
I'll drink to that. (she toasts, with
milk.) Shane... Can I call you Shane?
... Sure.
So. When you agreed to serve your
country, I bet you didn't know you'd be
serving creamed bananas to one year olds,
huh?
Shane gives her a look. Principal Claire smiles.
Hey -- I out rank you, you know.
Not here, you don't. You're on dry land,
lieutenant. (she looks at his chair)
Well, not so dry where you're sitting, I
guess.
Shane sees that Tyler is pouring his juice Box all over
Shane's pants. He yanks Tyler away from him.
Tyler starts to cry -- but Shane stops him from crying by making a funny face. Tyler laughs. Claire smiles.

dialogue.text: Tyler starts to cry -- but Shane stops him from crying by making a funny face. Tyler laughs. Claire smiles.

segments.content: Don't take this personally -- but you're
pretty good at this. Seriously, I'm
impressed. A whole day, and all three
Plummer's stayed out of trouble.

LUNCH-LINE - CONTINUOUS Students are in a ring, cheering, as four STUDENTS in Wrestling Jackets hold Todd. One reaches down and gives Todd a "wedgy" then another WRESTLER punches him. Todd started a fight with five students

The kid's mixed up. Look at him.
If I catch anyone on the team fighting

You heard the lady. Any more fighting and

I think that's a little harsh. Boys'll be

here.
Todd lunges at him. Shane effortlessly grabs Todd and
Judo FLIPS HIM -- Todd lands on his feet, sticking the

The Bell rings, the crowd breaks up. Murney approaches

Pretty slick, Frogman -- I'm a black belt

Murney makes a loud Kung Fu CRY and throws a punch,

See -- total control. Maybe you could
stop by practice, we'd show the boys how
a couple of pros do it, what do you say?
Come on, promise I'll go easy on you.
... Sorry, sir. I'm on duty.
Oh, yeah. That's right. I forgot you had
to baby-sit. Maybe some other time then.
Shane puts an arm over Todd's shoulder. Todd shakes him
off and heads to class. Murney snickers to Claire:
Looks like pretty boy there's all bark
and no bite.
... Don't even think it, Murney. He'd
kill you so fast, I wouldn't even have
time to get my camera.

Shane looks exhausted. Peter is asleep in his shoulder,

          Tyler is crying, as he keeps watch. The Principal strolls

Another day, another dollar twenty, minus
taxes... aren't you gonna change him?
I'd love to, for one who'll eat, and not
cry.
Then Shane smells what she means -- Tyler's diaper is full. Shane recoils in disgust, holding Tyler out like a grenade.

segments.content:
He turns a corner -- a PLYWOOD WALL surrounds the site.

          He leaps out of the minivan. He looks at the tracker: Zoe

          and Todd are dead ahead, through the fence.

Two BIG CONSTRUCTION workers are standing on the other

          section, and charges through.
He turns around, to see several CONSTRUCTION WORKERS, all brandishing tools.

character.name: What hell do you think you're doing?

dialogue.text: He turns around, to see several CONSTRUCTION WORKERS, all brandishing tools.

segments.content: Tell me where the kids are and I'll let
you all live!

Three Workers rush him. Shane easily takes them out. The remaining Workers give Shane a scared look -- then RUN. ANGLE - SHANE He's alone. He catches his breath, then checks his tracker. Todd and Zoe's BEEPS are coming from a MANHOLE. Shane pries off the manhole cover.    He looks down. IN THE MANHOLE - It's dark and dank. No sweat. Shane lowers himself down. INT. SEWER - SAME TIME Shane lands shoulder deep in DISGUSTING SLUDGE. He winces, then checks the tracker -- the DOTS are CLOSE, feet away. Shane trudges through the river of muck.

character.name: Buddy, you're about to get a beat down.

segments.content:
Principal Claire sits with the Kids in the living room.

          From outside, they hear the front door open, and the

          Then the door swings open, revealing Shane, looking like

14 year old Male, weird hair. 16 year old
female. Ditto. (into his radio:) Cancel
that a.p.b..
The Cop turns to Shane, with a smirk.
In the future, use our nonemergency
number. That's the one to call if
nobody's fleein' or bleedin'.
The Cop leaves, Zoe checks him out as he goes...
Shane are you okay?
(eerily calm:)
Covering her nose. The smell is BAD.

segments.content: I should probably get going then. If you

She practically GAGS as she passes him. Shane looks

Shane is in the shower. He pours an entire bottle of

Shane BURNS his clothes in the barbecue.

Tyler is in a high-chair, Peter rocks in a cradle-swing.

          Shane enters, in just a towel. He sees on the fridge;

oo hoo! Hubba hubba!
Shane covers up and leaps into the Family Room, pulling
Lulu after him.
Who are those people?
It's my troop, it's Monday. Monday,
Wednesday and Saturday are troop nights.
Get rid of them.
I can't. Everybody's parents go out on
troop nights. They won't be home `til
ten. Mom's our den mother.
Lulu starts to sniffle, close to tears.
Tonight we're supposed to sell cookies.
Selling cookies isn't imperative to my
mission.
We have to. If we don't sell enough
cookies, we can't go the Jamboree, and if
we can't go to the Jamboree.
(whispers:)
Come on, Shane. You gotta help me out.
They already think I'm a loser. And it's
not like I have any other friends, cause
mom never lets me out of her sight...
Lulu's about to burst into tears. Shane sighs.

Shane, back in "uniform," paces in front of the Brownie

Alright, ladies. Here's how it's gonna
be. Tonight, I'm gonna be your den --
commander. That means if you want to live
to see tomorrow, do as I say. DO WE

Den Mother? ... I'm scared of you.

BEAT IT, before I get my face punching

character.name: Those boys over there broke our cookies.

segments.content: This is not a toy. I'm here to protect

You can't take us home yet, you're
supposed to take us to dinner.

Anything elsh I can do for you?
In a big glass (he shows him)   This much
ice... this much cyanide.

How `bout a re-fill on that pischer of

(gesturing:)

I'm watching your brother...
I pressed two player. I thought you liked

happily splashing about in the plastic balls.
ON THE SCREEN: they each select a fighter. Lulu picks a

Prepare to be annihilated!
She leaps over Shane in a somersault and throws a DOZEN
throwing stars. Then kicks him in the head repeatedly.
That's not fair. Nobody can jump thirty
feet.
The Hulk can.

The second round starts, Brownies have gathered around to watch. Lulu's fighter does a series of kicks. Shane can't even get one punch in -- she pins him to the ground, kneels on his head, then kicks him in the face. Shane is taking it really seriously. He's really mad.

segments.content: I figured you'd come back for him -- they
almost always do.
Inexcusable, to leave a man behind like
that...
Relax, we once found a kid in the ball
pool when we opened in the morning --
Shane wades into the ball pool and pulls Peter out, which
is fine, except that he's MISSING HIS DIAPER.
WHOA, Whoa. Not okay, freestyling in the
ball pool -- not okay.
Shane grimaces. He holds his breath, and goes down for
the diaper. He disappears under the balls -- for a long
time. The Manager and the Brownies share a concerned
look. He's still down there. Silence.
He surfaces, gasping. He's holding the diaper, out away from him. He charges across the room with the diaper.

character.name: Should we send someone in after him?

dialogue.text: He surfaces, gasping. He's holding the diaper, out away from him. He charges across the room with the diaper.

segments.content: And he bursts out the other doors, at a full run. EXT. PLUMMER HOUSE - NIGHT Shane is exhausted, as he pulls up in the Minivan. He gets out -- and groans in disbelief. It's insanity: HIP HOP blasts, gyrating TEENAGERS everywhere, chugging drinks, making out, peeing in the bushes, jocks throwing footballs. Reeling, Shane takes Lulu, Peter and Tyler up the path. He protectively guides them past the craziness -- until a football suddenly WHIZZES by. Outraged, Shane snatches it mid-air -- then CRUSHES the ball. POP! hane gives a blood-curdling stare.

segments.content: No one leaves until this house is
spotless! I want to be able to eat off
the floor! The latrine! Hell, I wanna
be able to eat in the kitchen!!
Nervous glances -- then everybody suddenly RUNS for the
back! Shane is confused, trying to understand...
then he intuitively dashes past them! He's scoping the
surroundings... windows... vents... AH! The doggy door!
Scott is halfway through the doggy door when Shane grabs
his ankles and yanks him back in. Shane holds Scott
upsidedown by his ankles.
Oh no you don't. Now, we're gonna do this
my way -- no highway option.
Just then: A MUSTARD SOAKED BALONEY SLICE drops from the
ceiling, sticking to the TOP of Shane's head. PLOP.
Shane's eyes narrow, he takes it off, trying to maintain
his dignity. He fumes...
He hands Scott the mop. Scott gulps - and starts mopping.

dialogue.text: He hands Scott the mop. Scott gulps - and starts mopping.

segments.content:
Miserable TEENS scrub. In a bathroom, Scott and Zoe, in

          Playtex gloves, furiously clean. Scott scrubs the toilet

          with Pinesol as the Duck swims in the top of the toilet.
This is officially the worst party ever.
It was YOUR idea! I don't even know most
of these losers.

Shane inspects the house, as kids clean. Shane wipes a

          finger down the sofa. Clean. He lifts the sofa, and rubs

          his finger UNDER IT. He holds it up to a KID... residue.

          The Kid quickly starts cleaning again.

          A GIRL reorganizes a stack of CD'S. Shane goes over

          them, straightening -- then he notices something. He

          pulls out a CD: It is a home-burned disk, labeled with a

          Sharpie. It reads: GHOST. Oh my god...

Two DARK CLAD FIGURES watch, through binoculars. They see

          Shane find the CD, and walk out of sight.
Shane quickly tucks the CD into his pocket.

A long line of exhausted party-goers files out. Scott's

          the last one to leave.

Shane works his way through the house. It's SPOTLESS:

          counter tops glisten, furniture polished. It looks like

          Better Homes and Gardens. He heads upstairs. Zoe blows

          past him -- into the bathroom, where she throws up. Shane

          sits down, outside the bathroom door.
... Thanks a lot, Rambo. My friends will
never come here again.
Those people aren't your friends. They
show no respect for you or your house.
Because you have no respect for yourself.
ueasy, she pukes again. Shane hands her a handkerchief.

dialogue.text: ueasy, she pukes again. Shane hands her a handkerchief.

segments.content: You got barf on your tank top.
(Announces:) Company, downstairs!
He walks down the hall, Zpounding on doors.
Shane stops. Lulu and Todd step into the hall. Zoe gets up, shaky and furious, and screams in Shane's face.

dialogue.text: Shane stops. Lulu and Todd step into the hall. Zoe gets up, shaky and furious, and screams in Shane's face.

segments.content: We hate you, you hate us. You're like a
robot. Why don't you just leave us alone?
Silence. Lulu's crying, Todd picks her up. Shane stands,
helpless. After a beat...
You're right, Red 1. I'm not the man for
this job.
Shane --!
In all my years I have never been treated
with such disrespect. Not even from the
enemy. Don't worry, as soon as your mom
comes back, I'm gone.
Suddenly -- the power goes out.
Now what?
(sighs, tired) It's Scott...
Puberty... talking doesn't do any good.
Suddenly, TWO NINJAS, all in black BURST in through the window. Shane spins in fight-stance.

dialogue.text: Suddenly, TWO NINJAS, all in black BURST in through the window. Shane spins in fight-stance.

segments.content: (to the kids:)

Terrified, Zoe and Todd scoop up the kids and rush down the hall. The Ninjas pull a retractable KENDO STAFFS. Wielding them with great skill. It takes all of Shane's skill to fend them off -- the three fight, close-quarters and fast. Until Shane pulls down attic's spring-loaded FOLDING LADDER and clocks a Ninja with it. He goes down, but Shane is SHOCKED from behind by the other NINJA. The Ninjas attack, fiercely -- they're good. Their Kendo staffs hiss with a powerful ELECTRIC CURRENT. The Ninjas knock Shane backwards down the stairs...

          disappointed to have lost them.

Composing himself, Shane approaches Zoe's door.     He

          quietly knocks.

A long pause -- then the door creaks open. The kids run out and hug Shane with all their strength, bawling. Todd and Zoe enter, terrified. Shane isn't sure what to do... Then, he hugs Peter and Lulu. He really hugs them.

character.name: Kids.   It's safe. You can open up.

segments.content: I'm sorry for giving you a hard time.
Shhh... It's okay.
Who were they? What did they want...?
They're looking for a program, that your
father invented.
So Mom's not paranoid? There really are
people out to get us.
He takes out the CD labeled GHOST.
They're not after you. They want this.
But nothing's gonna happen to you, as
long as I'm here. And I'm not going
anywhere.
The kids shudder, relieved. They hug him tighter. He
looks Zoe, eye to eye. He dries her tears:
But I can't do this without your help,
okay? We need a little more cooperation
here. (the Kids nod) Tell you what --
let's start over. From now on, you listen
to me, and do what I say. (to Zoe and
Todd:) And I... I'll listen to you too.

Mrs. Plummer... two men tried to get into

Oh my god!
No - it's okay. They're gone, everyone's

Bill thinks it's part of the GHOST. It

don't know what its for.
She holds up the strange, metal two pronged KEY.
The good news is I'll be home in two
days, as soon as the customs paperwork
clears.
(very genuine)
...So soon? We were just starting to have

Claire nods. Shane gives Zoe a look. Zoe shrugs.

segments.content: Ordinarily I would wait for his mother to
return... but -- I'm a bit concerned, and
I'm not sure what to do...
Has he been skipping class?
Well -- yes. He does always miss sixth
period. But this...
Murney calls into the hallway. Todd enters. Shane stops,
in shock: Todd's long hair is all shaved off, he now has
a bleach blonde BUZZ CUT, giving him a "skinhead" look.
This is how he showed up to practice. And
that's not all. I was doing a little re-
con in his locker... and I found this:
Murney hands Shane a book and Shane flips through it.
It's a book of photographs of NAZI UNIFORMS. Shane
scowls.
If he'd had Hustler or something, boys
will be boys -- but this is just sick.
He's not a NAZI.
It's certainly not normal.
(pulls Shane aside.)
See if you can talk to the boy.   Find out
what's going on.
Shane shakes his head: Todd is worse than he thought.
Todd and Zoe stand to go, and Shane walks them out.
The WRESTLING TEAM is assembled, stretching. They snicker
and shake their heads at Todd, as he passes. Shane walks
the kids out, and Murney chases after him.
hope you won't go light on him -- that
whole family's no good, if you ask me.
I'll talk to him.
You're a good man, Shane. Bet you're a
hell of a fighter on the mats, huh?
(Shane ignores him, and keeps
walking.)
Maybe sometime we oughta strap up, we'll
give these boys a treat.
He "fake-punches" one of his Boys -- who flinches like
Murney has maybe hurt him a couple times. Murney laughs.
Another time, maybe...
It's a date then. I'll show you a couple
moves. I promise I won't hurt you.

See that? You never know when your
adversary is going to strike!
Did you kick me in the back? Is there a
footprint on my jacket?
Shane dusts off his back, and leaves.

To write on...

Shane bursts into laughter. His whole face lights up for the first time ever... Todd and Liesl dance. Todd is good, but nervous. character.name: You are sixteen, going on seventeen...

segments.content: Baby Jesus, have I done some unspeakable
evil that I deserve to be saddled with
the world's worst production of Sound of
Music? (he shouts, at the cast:) We open
in a week. The set's not finished... The
cast is a bunch of clumsy goats -- every
kick ball change would make Bob Fosse dig
himself out of the earth, so he could
have a heart attack again.
I'm sorry... I'll get it right.
None of you will ever get it right! Which
is why, I quit.
He throws down his script. The Cast is stunned.
And with that, he exits stage right...
end scene.
And, on his own cue... he exits stage right, in a huff.
The entire cast looks to Todd, fuming.
Shane jumps up from his hiding place, startling
everybody. Everyone steps back. Todd is terrified.
Shane kneels down beside Todd. He closes his eyes, and
begins rubbing his hands together like Mr. Miyagi.
You gonna fix him?
Shane grabs Todd's ankle hard and unceremoniously CRACKS it, and yanks him to his feet.

segments.content: I'm not going to quit. I hate wresting...
AT EASE. (Todd shuts up) Would you
listen, just once? Look, I don't know a
hell of a lot about this kinda stuff,
but... You're good. A lot to learn, but
with hard work, discipline -- you could
make a go of this.
... but what about Murney?
Todd smiles, relieved. They sit on the edge of the stage.

segments.content: "Sound of Music" is a great show. My dad
took me to see it when I was a kid.
Shane smiles wistfully. Todd relaxes.

He flips the switch to DISARMED. The safe's red light turns green. Immediately, the flamethrowers and blowguns retract! The gas gets sucked into grates. The whole room goes SILENT. Whew. Bill looks around. He nervously steps forward - he waves his hand over the floor, and jumps back. Nothing happens. Bill signals for Mrs. Chun to go first. She gestures back: you go. It's a stand-off. Finally, Bill takes a breath -- and walks across the room. The Booby Traps are disarmed. Mrs. Chun follows, pulling Julie along.

character.name: And that's the Peter Panda Dance.

dialogue.text: He flips the switch to DISARMED. The safe's red light turns green. Immediately, the flamethrowers and blowguns retract! The gas gets sucked into grates. The whole room goes SILENT. Whew. Bill looks around. He nervously steps forward - he waves his hand over the floor, and jumps back. Nothing happens. Bill signals for Mrs. Chun to go first. She gestures back: you go. It's a stand-off. Finally, Bill takes a breath -- and walks across the room. The Booby Traps are disarmed. Mrs. Chun follows, pulling Julie along.

segments.content: Thank you, Shane. You were always my best
man. I knew you'd figure it out.
Shane scowls, disgusted.
You know, if you're willing to join up,
I'd be happy to cut you in on the
proceeds. What do you say -- we make a
good team?
I was devoted to you, sir. And you
betrayed all of that. All that we stand
for.
Beat.   Bill shrugs.
Bill turns to the safe. He starts to reach for the dial... then catches himself. Something's not right.

dialogue.text: Bill turns to the safe. He starts to reach for the dial... then catches himself. Something's not right.

segments.content: ... I think you better open it.
Shane reaches for the safe, before he reaches the dial --
Bill thinks, trying to read Shane's poker face. Shane shrugs. Bill gestures to Mrs. Chun.

character.name: Wait. That's just what you want isn't it?

dialogue.text: Bill thinks, trying to read Shane's poker face. Shane shrugs. Bill gestures to Mrs. Chun.

segments.content: Mrs. Chun doesn't budge.

dialogue.text: Mrs. Chun doesn't budge.

segments.content: Reluctantly - Mrs. Chun reaches out, and touches the dial. Nothing happens. Relief. She turns it, and ZAPPPPP! 1000 volts ELECTROCUTES her, her hair on end, shaking from the voltage... Bill is off guard, Shane kicks his gun away! The gun skids into the acid and plunges, SIZZLING. Bill is incensed, but Shane gazes coldly.

character.name: Oh come on. I walked the floor first.

dialogue.text: Reluctantly - Mrs. Chun reaches out, and touches the dial. Nothing happens. Relief. She turns it, and ZAPPPPP! 1000 volts ELECTROCUTES her, her hair on end, shaking from the voltage... Bill is off guard, Shane kicks his gun away! The gun skids into the acid and plunges, SIZZLING. Bill is incensed, but Shane gazes coldly.

segments.content: There will be no mercy.

Full of himself, Bill LUNGES. And he's strong!     He shoves Shane back, then PUNCHES him in the gut. Shane glares, then returns an onslaught of BLOWS. Shane's fury is unleashed: A volley of attacks, hitting Bill's arms, head, legs! He's crazed, unrelenting. But suddenly Mrs. Chun LEAPS onto his back.

dialogue.text: Full of himself, Bill LUNGES. And he's strong!     He shoves Shane back, then PUNCHES him in the gut. Shane glares, then returns an onslaught of BLOWS. Shane's fury is unleashed: A volley of attacks, hitting Bill's arms, head, legs! He's crazed, unrelenting. But suddenly Mrs. Chun LEAPS onto his back.

segments.content: She SCREAMS and grabs his throat. Shane struggles to
lose her. Suddenly, he drops and FLIPS her. She
catapults, stumbles backwards across the room, and stops
just inches from the acid! She teeters, tottering,
unable to gain her balance.
Shane shakes his head, then runs to grab her outstretched
hand. She smiles, saved. But he's unforgiving.
Shane COLD-COCKS her, knocking her out. Suddenly --

dialogue.text: Shane COLD-COCKS her, knocking her out. Suddenly --

segments.content: Bill is charging him.   Shane whirls, delivering a ROUNDHOUSE KICK. OOF!   Bill gets slammed in the chest. Bill tumbles, the wind knocked out of him. He jumps to his feet, delivering a series of hard punches, which Shane deflects -- they tangle like pro's. It's clear the both have the same training. They punch, spin, kick, connecting only occasionally. Bill wheels around and lands a kicks squarely in Shane's chest. Shane tumbles, landing on his back in front of the safe. ANGLE - BILL He steps over Shane. Leering mercilessly, he jabs the spike against Shane's throat.

dialogue.text: Bill is charging him.   Shane whirls, delivering a ROUNDHOUSE KICK. OOF!   Bill gets slammed in the chest. Bill tumbles, the wind knocked out of him. He jumps to his feet, delivering a series of hard punches, which Shane deflects -- they tangle like pro's. It's clear the both have the same training. They punch, spin, kick, connecting only occasionally. Bill wheels around and lands a kicks squarely in Shane's chest. Shane tumbles, landing on his back in front of the safe. ANGLE - BILL He steps over Shane. Leering mercilessly, he jabs the spike against Shane's throat.

segments.content: Julie gasps. Shane narrows his eyes, then whispers/sings.

dialogue.text: Julie gasps. Shane narrows his eyes, then whispers/sings.

segments.content: ... Say, good night, Peter Panda!
The CODE! A BELL rings, and the safe door flies open!
SLAMMING Bill in the head! BONG! Bill's collapses and
drops. K.O.!

The minivan races toward the house.   The Police Cars

          chase after, SIRENS wailing.

          IN THE VAN, everyone is SCREAMING.
Zoe! You're going too fast!! You're not
gonna have enough time to stop-
Hey, I'M the one in Driver's Ed!    I think

WIDE She squeals into the driveway, then BRAKES. But it's too late. The van SKIDS, smoke BURNING from the tires -- and hits a tree. The Kid spill out and run. The lead Police Car screeches to a stop.   POLICE leap from the car. INT. SECRET VAULT - SAME TIME Shane and Julie stare at each other, then look in the safe: Inside, the cavernous metal box holds but one object: A tiny COMPUTER CHIP. Shane gently removes it.

dialogue.text: WIDE She squeals into the driveway, then BRAKES. But it's too late. The van SKIDS, smoke BURNING from the tires -- and hits a tree. The Kid spill out and run. The lead Police Car screeches to a stop.   POLICE leap from the car. INT. SECRET VAULT - SAME TIME Shane and Julie stare at each other, then look in the safe: Inside, the cavernous metal box holds but one object: A tiny COMPUTER CHIP. Shane gently removes it.

segments.content: They look in silence. She smiles at Shane, grateful.
Thank you Shane. It's finally over. Now
we can go back to our peaceful...
Then -- a sudden AMPLIFIED VOICE from behind them:

Total commotion. The kids clamber from the van, with

          their hands raised. Cops surround them. Even Peter and

          Tyler have their little hands over their heads.   The

          garage door raises, Shane steps out.
Whoa, WHOA!    What are you doing to these
kids??

heading.subject: FREEZE. HANDS WHERE I CAN SEE THEM.
heading.raw_text: FREEZE. HANDS WHERE I CAN SEE THEM.

segments.content: Cops cover Shane and Julie, Julie and Shane Freeze.
But, officer...
I said FREEZE. Zoe, you're in a lot of
trouble... Reckless endangerment!
Driving without a license. Numerous,
uh... trafficS violations --
(cutting him off)
These kids are heroes. They just aided
in exposing a high-level espionage ring.
Silence. The Cops are unsure what to do. He scoffs.

character.name: I suggest you call the FBI. Now.

dialogue.text: Silence. The Cops are unsure what to do. He scoffs.

segments.content: Suddenly -- a CRAZED SCREAM.

character.name: You expect me to believe any of that?

dialogue.text: Suddenly -- a CRAZED SCREAM.

segments.content:
Everyone spins. Mr. Chun stands inside the gate,

          pointing a ROCKET LAUNCHER. He's disheveled and manic.

heading.subject: I WANT THE GHOST, TEN MILLION DOLLARS,
heading.raw_text: I WANT THE GHOST, TEN MILLION DOLLARS,

heading.subject: AND A DIRECT FLIGHT TO PYONGYANG!
heading.raw_text: AND A DIRECT FLIGHT TO PYONGYANG!

segments.content:
The cops freeze, helpless. Shane weighs his not so many

          options... Nobody is sure what to do.

          But then -- a WOMAN suddenly flips over the fence, vaults

          onto Chun, and KNOCKS him out with a Karate Chop.
Claire lands on her feet, triumphant. Even Chun is amazed, as he turns his head, Shane spins, and grabs the rocket launcher. CLOSE-UP - SHANE He breaks into a big grin.

dialogue.text: Claire lands on her feet, triumphant. Even Chun is amazed, as he turns his head, Shane spins, and grabs the rocket launcher. CLOSE-UP - SHANE He breaks into a big grin.

segments.content: She proudly smiles back at him.

He's flummoxed. This chaos is unsolvable.    Beaten, he

          reaches for his radio.
I think I'll call the FBI.

F.B.I. AGENTS swarm the area. Bill and the Chuns are

          being hauled away in cuffs. Julie huddles with the kids.

          Shane talks with an F.B.I. Agent.
Mr. Wolfe... that was nice work.   You're
a one-man battalion.
Just doing my job.
The Bureau is always looking for good
men. Do you have a card or something?
The Agent hands him a BUSINESS CARD, then walks off.
Shane examines it, swelling with pride.

The Kids are looking around, watching the FBI Agents

          work. Lulu is following one of the FBI Agents around.
Do you have to wear that thing in your
ear all the time?
Yes.
Does it itch?
Yes...
Zoe is looking at the safe. She sees, fallen onto the
floor, from the safe, a letter. Her siblings, and Julie
notice, and gather around. Zoe reads the LETTER:
If you're reading this, then Julie found
the key. Julie, Tyler, Peter, Zoe, Todd,
Lulu -- I want to say: I love you more
than anything. I always have.
A tear comes to her eye. The Plummers hug each other.
Claire walks up to Shane. Mock-angry.
So. What happens now? You'll be stationed
somewhere else, right? I guess there's no
more reason for you to stick around here.
Shane looks at her. He looks around: at the family. He
looks at Claire....
Well. I'm kinda, re-conning the
situation, here... And to tell the truth.
I don't see anything but reasons to stay.
Shane smiles slyly and pulls her close.

dialogue.text: Shane smiles slyly and pulls her close.

segments.content: ... I don't know. I'm on dry land. You're
the superior office. You tell me.
Well. Summer's almost here. What if you
and me did a little amphibious recon
mission. On, say -- Maui?
Claire beams. The Plummers all approach, interrupting. Zoe gives them a look -- that makes Shane and Claire BLUSH. Lulu turns to Shane, sad.

dialogue.text: Claire beams. The Plummers all approach, interrupting. Zoe gives them a look -- that makes Shane and Claire BLUSH. Lulu turns to Shane, sad.

segments.content: This is it. Your work here is through.
Guess you have to go now...
She puts out her hand, to shake his.

He surprises her with a BEAR HUG -- he hugs the whole family at once, squeezing them off the ground. He puts them down. Before he goes: he reaches down and gives Zoe - - his medal. He squeezes her hand around it.

dialogue.text: He surprises her with a BEAR HUG -- he hugs the whole family at once, squeezing them off the ground. He puts them down. Before he goes: he reaches down and gives Zoe - - his medal. He squeezes her hand around it.

segments.content: But...
He would've wanted me to give it to
someone I care about. Like he did. Thank
you. For everything.
TIGHT - SHANE This is too much.    He wipes his face.

dialogue.text: TIGHT - SHANE This is too much.    He wipes his face.

segments.content: Shane bawls -- he can't keep it in. He starts to head off, Lulu calls after him:

character.name: Your dad would be so proud.

dialogue.text: Shane bawls -- he can't keep it in. He starts to head off, Lulu calls after him:

segments.content: Shane, we're never gonna see you again!
What are you talking about?      I'm gonna
see you Friday night.
A long beat.    Julie looks up, baffled.
INT. VICTORIA THEATRE, BACKSTAGE - NIGHT Close on Shane:

dialogue.text: INT. VICTORIA THEATRE, BACKSTAGE - NIGHT Close on Shane:

segments.content: Tonight is the night we trained for, and
failure is not an option! No detail is
too small! We are the BEST! Remember
your lines, hit your marks, and stay in
character! I expect perfection!
(he grins)
Wider reveals the Cast of `The Sound of Music'.

dialogue.text: Wider reveals the Cast of `The Sound of Music'.

segments.content:
Shane's military-march version of the musical. Nuns sing

          "How Do You Solve a Problem Like Maria?" The Von Trapp

          kids perform "So Long, Farewell."

          In the audience, Julie watches in astonishment. She is

          surrounded by her children. Scott: in a suit, his hair

          combed, Claire: dressed to the nines, the little Brownie

          Troop, even Murney. Lulu has a basket in her lap --

          inside: GARY THE DUCK and his new family, the most

          adorable ducklings you ever saw.

          They all watch, rapt.

          You Are Sixteen begins. Shane watches with bated breath.

          Todd spins. In SLOW MOTION, he leaps into the SPIN KICK.

          It's fantastic -- a Michael Jordan dunk. The AUDIENCE

          goes nuts, Shane stands, and shouts:

The Audience stares at him, until he sits back down, beaming with pride. Finally: "CLIMB EVERY MOUNTAIN." Hearts swell, as the family crosses the papier-mache alps. A STANDING OVATION. The performers take their curtain calls, then giddily gesture Shane to come out. He humbly steps into view -- and the house goes crazy. Thundering applause. A cellophane bouquet of flowers gets thrust on him. Shane smiles, touched. Mission accomplished.
